an4.254:2.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā?
an4.254:2.3: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā.
an4.254:3.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā?
an4.254:3.3: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā.
an4.254:4.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā?
an4.254:4.3: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā.
an4.254:5.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā?
an4.254:5.3: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā.
